TopicTitle: We built a KSP rocket festival float

Articles.Content:
Thought that you guys might like this, so reposting from our reddit thread :]

"For ten days we have built this thing at Chalmers University in Sweden, quite a bit of beer and gaffa later we had something resembling a rocket and gave it a go ahead.The cortÃƒÂ©ge is a university thing where people build funny stuff and drink beer and have fun. so we decided to build a KSP rocket. The idea was that we have a rocket that fail to launch and have a unexpected disassembly on the launchpad. The kerbals walking around are supposed to flail around but the movie here is a trial run so none was really into it (except the guy in the background)"

Video and in-progress-pictures can be found at: http://www.reddit.com/r/KerbalSpaceProgram/comments/34ge86/we_built_a_ksp_rocket_at_chalmers_cort%C3%A9ge/

Edited May 1, 2015 by fluffdesu

DO YOU REALIZE HOW AMAZING THIS IS?!

Wow! Obviously the parade is in celebration of 1.0.
